channel.title: Portfolios on Anna Lunterova
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Anna Lunterova

item.title: Analog collection
item.description: Hand drawn data visualisations of my personal data - such as 34 days of my 30 tomatoes growth experiment featured at Georgia’s Lupi talk Finding humanity in data, or examples of analog data postcards that we send to each other with a good friend Slavo for a half year. For the latter project, I was inspired by Dear Data, and lured Slavo to collect and draw our personal data for a different theme each week - ranging from tracking our disappointments, feelings, “thank you” we gave and received, number of observed smiles, etc.
